JobFullDesc: Are you an experienced, passionate pioneer in technology? A operations professional who wants to work in a collaborative environment. As an experienced (Skillset example - Project Manager) you will have the ability to share new ideas and collaborate on projects as a consultant without the extensive demands of travel. If so, consider an opportunity with Deloitte under our Project Delivery Talent Model. Project Delivery Model (PDM) is a talent model that is tailored specifically for long-term, onsite client service delivery. PDM practitioners are local to project locations, minimizing extensive travel, and provides you with a full career path within the firm.Work you'll do/Responsibilities  Our client works as an independent broker for functional community input and prioritization of portfolio initiatives for the client's decision making process that supports migration of strategy to action. Specifically, the team provides analysis and reporting to decision makers and supports the development and management of requirements, business processes, data management strategies and collaboration in the development and implementation of standardized business processes. The Team The US Operations Transformation Offering applies deep sector knowledge and technical business operations consulting experience to take a more strategic view of our clients' priorities, helping them to prepare for growth, embrace the digital agenda, optimize costs, and maximize operational efficiency. Our market offerings include Operating Model Transformation and Center for Process Bionics. Qualifications  Self-starter with a passion for doing impactful work and translating complex issues into clear and concise products for a variety of audiences.  Strong executive presence and experience working with senior clients in high-visibility situations.  Comfortable with meeting preparation and facilitation.  Excellent attention to detail.  Ability to coordinate and prioritize multiple tasks.  Ability to analyze and summarize complicated concepts into succinct, easy to understand process summaries.  Able to proactively anticipate client needs and propose solutions.  Confidence and ability to complete quick-turn requests.  Excellent communication, story-boarding, and organizational skills.  Comfort in communicating and developing strong working relationships with numerous client stakeholders to drive efforts forward.  Ability to think strategically and adapt seamlessly.  Interest in strategy development and management.  Works well with ambiguity and change.  Comfortability with working in a fluid matrix structure and a high degree of adaptability to shifting roles.  Consistently reliable when it comes to inter-disciplinary communication, responses and collaboration. Accountable during work hours and is easily reached and communicative despite the remote structure. Other considerations:  • DoD experience preferred  • PMP preferred Required • Experience with Microsoft Project, including the following Microsoft Project features:  o Sharing people using a resource pool  o Proactively managing resource utilization  o Identifying resource over-allocation  o Creating resource-leveled schedules  o Distributing work by leveling based on priority  o Tracking resource progress  o Forecasting resource needs  o Integrating and coordinating across smaller projects to see holistic views of resource use  o Estimating durations based on historical data  o Setting project baselines and using them to measure progress  o Creating and customizing reports  o Understanding manual vs. auto schedule modes  • Project management experience:  o Documenting requirements, capturing, tracking, and following up on action items and responding to inquiries on detailed project activities  o Frequent project reporting, including detailed project status reporting  o Coordinating and collaborating with stakeholders to facilitate completion of project objectives  o Leading and facilitating meetings, teleconferences, and web conferences to collect information needed for project tasks or schedules  o Managing schedule changes and minimizing project risks  o Developing business rules and administrative control systems to ensure effective staff utilization and project alignment based on strategic objectives  o Developing and monitoring metrics to measure progress and make recommendations to leadership for decision making  o Knowledge Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK) and scrum methodologies Other considerations:  • DoD experience preferred  • PMP preferred * MUST HAVE OR BE ABLE TO OBTAIN A U.S. SECURITY CLEARANCE, LEVEL PUBLIC TRUST
